Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add 4-level context extraction system for AI Contour

- Add SQL migration 007_domains_context_extraction.sql with:
  - Global/Domain/Vertical/Tenant hierarchy tables
  - 3 domains seeded \(electronics, auto, software\)
  - 14 action types + 15 trigger types catalogs
  - Universal workers system tables
  - Funnel stages with inheritance

- Add architecture documentation CONTEXT_EXTRACTION_ARCHITECTURE.md

- Add n8n workflows \(for manual import\):
  - ELO_AI_Extract_v2: 4-level context extraction
  - ELO_Funnel_Controller: stage transitions
  - ELO_Context_Router: domain/vertical routing
  - ELO_Worker_Executor: universal worker execution

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
